items.name: Dr. Bachir Hameurlain
items.comment:
My evaluation of the platform:

This experience has been outstanding on all fronts, with seriousness, discipline, and method. It feels like an authentic scientific project drawing from the Salaf, combining tradition and modern tools.

Scientific impact:

I noticed real progress in understanding, mastering terms, and absorbing texts, especially in Aqeedah and Fiqh. This platform reordered my priorities and connected me to a comprehensive methodology, far from dispersion.

Main benefits:
â€¢ Carefully selected content based on trusted sources, with clear explanations.
â€¢ Adapted teaching method with logical progression.
â€¢ Outstanding teacher support, more like mentors than just professors. Interaction, guidance, and care are obvious.

May Allah bless these efforts and make this platform a beacon of guidance and success.

diploma.desc1: The Qualification Diploma is one of the fundamental certificates awarded by Zitouna educational institutions, representing an advanced stage in the Zitouna educational ladder. The student receives this diploma after completing an intensive study program focusing on Sharia sciences, Arabic language, and auxiliary sciences such as logic and rhetoric. This diploma demonstrates the student's mastery of the essential courses enabling progression to higher Zitouna study levels. The curricula include in-depth studies of Fiqh, Tafsir, Hadith, and Grammar, reflecting Zitouna's commitment to producing students with a solid understanding of Islamic principles.
diploma.desc2: The Diploma of Achievement is the next step in the Zitouna educational path, awarded to students who demonstrate advanced comprehension of Sharia and literary sciences and mastery of research and analytical skills. It qualifies the student to undertake teaching or religious guidance roles and serves as official recognition of their academic competence and ability to contribute to both academic and dawah fields. This stage emphasizes specialization in comparative Fiqh, Usul al-Fiqh, Hadith sciences, and enhances the student's ability to interpret Sharia texts according to contemporary developments.
